entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Snow with ice pellets in the afternoon and with freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
